articles.author: Brian Lowry
articles.title: ‘The Beanie Bubble’ nostalgically looks back at the ‘Babies’ boom that went bust - CNN
articles.description: Movies and TV have enjoyed a fertile run of rise-and-fall business stories, from Theranos to WeWork to Chippendales. Add to that list “The Beanie Bubble,” a nostalgia-infused look back at the plush-toy craze that swept America, turned collectors into “investo…
articles.content: Movies and TV have enjoyed a fertile run of rise-and-fall business stories, from Theranos to WeWork to Chippendales. Add to that list The Beanie Bubble, a nostalgia-infused look back at the plush-toy… [+2941 chars]

articles.title: Aging farm workforce forces a reckoning: Who will pick America's crops? - NPR
articles.description: U.S. farms have faced worker shortages for years. Now compounding the problem: The children of farmworkers are leaving the fields, forcing farm owners to look to other countries for labor.
articles.content:
Paola Mendoza, the daughter of farmworkers, says her parents didn't want her to join them in the fields. She's now in college, studying to be a teacher.
Mike Kane for NPR
TOPPENISH, Wash. By 6 in t… [+7323 chars]
